meta.description: Metrics organized by outcome type for OKR key result suggestions

growth.description: Metrics focused on expansion, acquisition, and scaling outcomes

metrics.name: Revenue Growth Rate
metrics.description: Percentage increase in revenue over a specific period

measurement.method: ((Current Period Revenue - Previous Period Revenue) / Previous Period Revenue) * 100
measurement.baseline_guidance: Use previous period performance and industry benchmarks
measurement.target_setting: Consider market growth rate + competitive advantage

good_usage: Increase MRR growth rate from 8% to 15% month-over-month
Achieve 25% YoY revenue growth in enterprise segment
Grow international revenue from $2M to $5M annually
implementation_notes: Track both absolute numbers and growth rates
Segment by customer type, product, or geography
Monitor leading indicators that drive revenue growth

metrics.name: Customer Acquisition Rate
metrics.description: Number of new customers acquired over a specific period

measurement.method: Count of new paying customers per time period
measurement.baseline_guidance: Historical acquisition rates and seasonal patterns
measurement.target_setting: Based on market size, sales capacity, and growth goals

good_usage: Acquire 500 new enterprise customers per quarter
Increase new customer acquisition from 200 to 400 per month
poor_usage: Acquire as many customers as possible
implementation_notes: Distinguish between leads, trials, and paying customers
Track acquisition by channel for optimization
Monitor quality of acquired customers (retention rates)

metrics.name: Market Share Growth
metrics.description: Increase in percentage of total addressable market captured

measurement.baseline_guidance: Current market position and competitive landscape analysis
measurement.target_setting: Based on competitive strategy and market opportunity

good_usage: Increase market share in mid-market CRM from 12% to 18%
Capture 25% of the enterprise cloud storage market
Grow from #4 to #2 market position in regional banking
implementation_notes: Define market boundaries clearly (geographic, segment, product)
Use multiple data sources for market size estimation
Track both absolute and relative competitive position

efficiency.description: Metrics focused on optimization, cost reduction, and productivity outcomes

metrics.name: Cost Per Acquisition (CPA)
metrics.description: Average cost to acquire a new customer through marketing and sales efforts

measurement.method: Total Acquisition Costs / Number of New Customers
measurement.baseline_guidance: Historical CPA by channel and customer segment
measurement.target_setting: Based on customer lifetime value and profitability targets

good_usage: Reduce customer acquisition cost from $150 to $100
Achieve CPA under $50 for SMB segment
Lower paid acquisition cost by 30% while maintaining volume
implementation_notes: Track by acquisition channel for optimization
Balance CPA reduction with customer quality and volume

quality.description: Metrics focused on excellence, reliability, and stakeholder satisfaction

metrics.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
metrics.description: Customer loyalty and satisfaction metric based on likelihood to recommend

measurement.baseline_guidance: Industry benchmarks and historical company performance
measurement.target_setting: Industry leading NPS scores and improvement trajectories

good_usage: Increase NPS from 32 to 50 through improved onboarding
Achieve industry-leading NPS of 70+ for enterprise customers
implementation_notes: Segment NPS by customer type and product
Follow up with detractors for improvement insights

innovation.description: Metrics focused on creativity, experimentation, and future capability building

metrics.name: New Product Revenue Percentage
metrics.description: Percentage of total revenue generated from products launched within specific timeframe

measurement.method: (Revenue from Products < 2 Years Old / Total Revenue) * 100
measurement.calculation: Quarterly percentage of revenue from new products
measurement.baseline_guidance: Historical innovation revenue and industry standards
measurement.target_setting: Based on innovation strategy and market dynamics

good_usage: Generate 30% of revenue from products launched in past 18 months
Achieve $5M revenue from new AI features launched this year
Increase new product revenue contribution from 15% to 25%
implementation_notes: Track both absolute revenue and percentage contribution
Monitor new product success rates and time-to-market
